SEARCH
Package Management

Klasse ProblemSupervisor

java.lang.Object
Management.ProblemSupervisor
public class ProblemSupervisor extends Object
A problem supervisor solves a single problem by using several cooperating solvers in parallel threads. Created by ohlbach on 09.10.2018.

  • Methodendetails

    • nextClauseId

      public int nextClauseId()
      for enumerating the clauses
      Gibt zurück:
      the next free clause identifier

    • solveProblem

      public void solveProblem()
      starts the solvers in parallel threads and waits for their results.

    • finished

      public void finished(Result result)
      This method is called to indicate that they have done their job or gave up. If the solver succeeded (satisfiable or unsatisfiable) then all other solvers are interrupted.
      Some messages are logged.

    • checkModel

      protected void checkModel(Satisfiable satisfiable)
      checks the model against the input clauses. If some clauses are false in this model, they are printed and the system exits.
      Parameter:
      satisfiable - the result of a SAT-search.

    • intermediateModelCheck

      public void intermediateModelCheck(Model model, Supplier supplier)

    • printStatistics

      public static void printStatistics(GlobalParameters globalParameters, ArrayList<ProblemSupervisor> problemSupervisors)
      The method collects the individual solver statistics into an array of Statistic-objects: statistics[0] = supervisor statistics
      statistics[1...] = solver statistics

    • reportResult

      public void reportResult(PrintStream out)
      prints the result to the PrintStream
      Parameter:
      out - a PrintStream
